#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <cmath>
#include <map>

#define dType long long int
#define run(n) std::ios::sync_with_stdio((n));
#define loop(t) while((t--))
#define getc() getchar();
#define print(d,c) print((d),(c));

using namespace std;
inline void syntax(){
	string ODD;
	while(cin >> ODD){
		if(ODD.length() >= 3){
			int k = 1;
			for(int i = (ODD.length() /2)-1; k <= 3; k++){
				cout << ODD[i];
				i++;
			}
		}else
			cout << '0';
		cout << '\n';
		//cout << ODD.length() / 2+1 << endl;
	}

}
int main(){

	run(0) syntax();
	
	return 0;
	
}
